const MainWindow * mParent

Detailed Description

Converts a boost variant into a QString.

The supplied MainWindow provides localization-depended double to string conversion (esp. regarding the decimal operator).

See also:
MainWindow::qstringFromDouble(), MainWindow::qstringFromComplex()
